alert.note: Alert for Northern Black Hills; Northern Foot Hills; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 2:08PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Meade and southeastern Lawrence Counties through 300 PM MDT... At 208 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 3 miles east of Brownsville, or 9 miles southeast of Lead, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Dalton Lake around 215 PM MDT. Galena around 220 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Tilford and Apple Springs. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 39 and 44. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Black Hills; Northern Foot Hills; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills
